gamerules_content:
Welcome to ELEMENTAL PRINCESS video slot, with 4 different Base Game Princess Spins and 4 different Free Games Features.

About the Game

ELEMENTAL PRINCESS is a 5 reel, 25 fixed paylines Video Slot that has 4 different randomly awarded Princess Spins during the Base Game, and includes 4 different Free Games Features which can be triggered by Scatters or at random. The Earth Princess feature awards Spreading Wilds, the Water Princess feature awards Held Wilds, the Fire Princess feature awards an Increasing Win Multiplier and the Air Princess Feature awards Floating Mega Wilds.

Return to Player

The overall theoretical return to player is 96.46%.

GAME RULES

Choose your coin value. 25 lines are played.
The total bet is 30 multiplied by the coin value.
Winning combinations and payouts are made according to the paytable.
Highest win only on each line.
All wins begin with leftmost reel and pay left to right on adjacent reels, except Scatters which pay any.
All wins on played lines only except scatters.
Wins on different lines are added.
Scatter wins are added to line wins.
Line wins are multiplied by the coin value.
Scatter wins are multiplied by the total bet.
Wild substitutes for all symbols, except Scatter.

Princess Spins

During any base game spin, a Princess Spin may be randomly awarded.
Free games can be triggered from a Princess Spin.
Princess spin is selected at random.

Earth Princess Spin - Spreading Wilds

EARTH WILD replaces base game Wild on all reels.
Any EARTH WILD that appears changes any adjacent Major1, Major2, Major3 and Major4 symbols to WILD.

Water Princess Spin - Added Wilds

WATER WILD replaces base game Wild on all reels.
2,3,5 or 10 WATER WILDS are added in random positions on the reels.

Fire Princess Spin - Win Multiplier

FIRE WILD replaces base game Wild on all reels.
All wins are multiplied by x2, x3, x5 or x10.

Air Princess Spin - Floating Mega Wild

AIR WILD replaces base game Wild on all reels.
A 1x2, 2x2, 3x2 or 3x3 Floating Mega WILD appears over the reels., and roams to a random position on the reels.

Free Games Features

3 or more SCATTER awards the Free Games Feature.
Free Games Feature can also be awarded at random.
4 Free Games Features available.
Earth Princess Feature - Spreading WILDS.
Water Princess Feature - Held WILDS.
Fire Princess Feature - Increasing Win Multiplier.
Air Princess Feature - Floating Mega WILDS.
Free Games Feature is selected at random.
Free Games Feature can be triggered again during the Free Games Feature.
Coin value is the same as the game that triggered the Free Games Feature.

Earth Princess Feature - Spreading WILDS

10 Free Games are awarded.
EARTH WILD replaces base game Wild on all reels.
Any EARTH WILD that appears changes any adjacent Major1, Major2, Major3 and Major4 symbols to WILD.
Earth Princess Feature can be re-triggered.
Earth Princess Feature can be randomly re-triggered.
Free Games are played at the paylines and coin value of the trigger game.

Water Princess Feature - Held WILDS

10 Free Games are awarded.
WATER WILD replaces base game Wild on all reels.
Any WATER WILD that appears remains in that position for any remaining free games.
Water Princess Feature can be re-triggered.
Water Princess Feature can be randomly re-triggered.
Free Games are played at the paylines and coin value of the trigger game.Fire Princess Feature - Increasing Win Multiplier10 Free Games are awarded.
FIRE WILD replaces base game Wild on all reels.
Free Games Win Multiplier starts at 1.
Any FIRE WILD that appear during the free games increase the Free Games Win Multiplier by 1. The increased Win Multiplier is applied before pays are adjudged on the current spin.
Fire Princess Feature can be re-triggered.
Fire Princess Feature can be randomly re-triggered.
Free Games are played at the paylines and coin value of the trigger game.

Air Princess Feature - Floating Mega WILDS

10 Free Games are awarded.
AIR WILD replaces base game Wild on all reels.
At the start of the Air Princess Feature, a 1x2 Floating Mega WILD appears over the reels. Each spin it floats to a random position.
Collect 2 AIR WILDS in total during Free Games to increase to a 2x2 Floating Mega WILD.
Collect 5 AIR WILDS in total during Free Games to increase to a 3x2 Floating Mega WILD.
Collect 9 AIR WILDS in total during Free Games to increase to a 3x3 Floating Mega WILD.
Air Princess Feature can be re-triggered.
Air Princess Feature can be randomly re-triggered.
Free Games are played at the paylines and coin value of the trigger game.

How to Play

Select the coin value.
Press the Spin Button to start game.

Autoplay Options

Number of Spins: The Autoplay session will stop when the selected number of spins has been reached.
Loss Limit: The Autoplay session will stop if your total loss for the Autospin session is equal to or exceeds the selected limit.
Single Win Limit: The Autoplay session will stop if the win on a single spin is equal to or exceeds the selected limit.

How to Calculate Wins

Each symbol's payout is listed in the paytable for all wins.
Multiply the coin win by the coin value to get the win in the home currency.

Game Options

Click the options icon to expand or collapse the options tray.
Volume - Turns the sounds on or off.
Paytable - Explains the main features in the game, displays all payouts (changes depending on cash view or coin view) and shows the lines or ways to win.
Settings - Volume, Sound, Music.
Game Rules - Opens the rules of the game.
History - If this feature is enabled on your gaming website, you may review your last 10 game rounds.
Home Button - Back to the lobby.

Game Panel

Bet - The bet is always 30 coins per spin.
Coin Value - Changes the Total Bet size by changing the coin value. To transform any bet or win in coins to the home currency, multiply the coin amount (30) by the coin value.
Total bet - Shows the total bet at the selected coin value Multiplied by the bet. Clicking on the field toggles between coin and cash view.
Max Bet - Sets the coin value to the largest available. Pressing the button a second time returns it to its original state (Desktop only).
Spin Button - Starts the game.
Autoplay Button - Opens the Autoplay Options. If Autoplay is active, clicking the button stops Autoplay.
Win - Displays the win for the current or last payout step. Clicking on the field toggles between coin and cash view.
Balance - Displays the player's account balance. Clicking on the field toggles between coin and cash view.
Stop Button - Stop the game.

Keyboard Shortcuts

Space Bar - Press the space bar to spin.
